name: Bullet Time (itch) (Oussama Khazri)
description:
"Bullet Time" , A Fast Paced 2D TopDown Shooter 

With The Ability Of 'Slowing Down Time'

( Made For 'Brackeys Game Jam (2021.1))

Credits :

Game by 'Oussama Khazri'

Music  :

Action Dark Sci-Fi' From 'Zapslat'

'Mega Hyper Ultra Storm' By 'Kevin Macleod'

Font :
